name: com.gamelovers.uiservice
author: Miguel Tomas
description:
This package provides a service to help manage an Unity's, game UI.
It allows to open, close, load, unload and request any Ui Configured in the game.
The package provides a Ui Set that allows to group a set of Ui Presenters to help load, open and close multiple Uis at the same time.

To help configure the game's UI you need to create a UiConfigs Scriptable object by:
- Right Click on the Project View > Create > ScriptableObjects > Configs > UiConfigs

samples.description: Basic UI presenter lifecycle: loading, opening, closing, and unloading UI.
Data-driven UI with UiPresenter<T>. Demonstrates initial data via OpenUiAsync and dynamic updates via the public Data property setter.
Time and animation-based delay features with TimeDelayFeature and AnimationDelayFeature.
Combining delay features with UI Toolkit for advanced composition patterns.
Group multiple UIs to load, open, and close together (e.g., game HUD with health, currency, minimap).
Create multiple instances of the same UI type (e.g., notification popups, chat windows).
Create custom presenter features (fade, scale, sound) by extending PresenterFeatureBase.
Compare PrefabRegistry, Addressables, and Resources loading strategies.
